== Welcome ==
{{ attachment:global192.png || align="left" }}<<BR>>
<<BR>>Welcome to the Lubuntu Global Team, an International support initiative for translating Lubuntu wiki contents and apps.
This will act as a sub-group for <nowiki>[[ https:--wiki.ubuntu.com-Lubuntu-CommunicationsTeam- | Lubuntu Comms Team ]]</nowiki> and it's related to <nowiki>[[ https:--wiki.ubuntu.com-Lubuntu-Marketing | Marketing ]]</nowiki>.<<BR>><<BR>>

~+'''Join us and Globalize Lubuntu'''!+~<<BR>><<BR>><<BR>><<BR>><<BR>>
